name: Ā Ō Kaizokudan
description: The A O Pirates are a pirate crew led by A O. They were a subordinate crew of the Whitebeard Pirates prior to Whitebeard's death.

name: Akumeito Kaizokudan
description: The Acumate Pirates are a group of pirates from an unknown region, under the captaincy of Devil Dias.

name: Arubida Kaizokudan
description: The Alvida Pirates were a group of pirates led by the female pirate "Iron Mace" Alvida. They were the first enemy pirates Luffy was seen to encounter. The crew has since dissolved into an alliance with the Buggy Pirates, forming the Buggy and Alvida Alliance, which later becomes the Pirate Dispatch Organization known as Buggy's Delivery. They are one of the antagonist groups in the Romance Dawn Arc.

name: Kohaku Minato no Kaizoku
description: The Amber Pirates are a crew commanded by One-Man.

name: Amīgo Kaizokudan
description: The Amigo Pirates were a pirate crew that allied themselves with Shiki and appeared in the anime-only Little East Blue Arc. They are led by Largo and his first mate Corto.

name: Āron Ichimi
description: The Arlong Pirates were a pirate crew led by Arlong. Every member of the crew was a fish-man, except for Nami (who later left). They existed before the Sun Pirates but joined with them when they were formed. After the death of Fisher Tiger, they split from Jinbe's crew after he became a Warlord and became their own crew once again. They believed they were above humans as the stronger species and looked down on them as inferior. After they were defeated, they were arrested. Due to their actions and role, they are the main antagonists of the Arlong Park Arc. After their leader's defeat by the Straw Hats, they are arrested and the crew itself is disbanded. Momoo was never taken into custody and Hatchan later escaped.

name: BIG Kaizokudan
description: The BIG Pirates are a non-canon pirate crew aligned with the Blackbeard Pirates. They fought under Marshall D. Teach in the Payback War and tried to snuff out the remnants of the Whitebeard Pirates after.

name: Banzai kaizoku-dan
description: The Banzai Pirates are a crew commanded by Banzai.

name: Barubaru Dan
description: The Barbar Pirates are sand pirates of the Arabasta Kingdom. The Barbar Pirates are skilled sand sailors. It is shown that they often clash with desert bandits. They travel the desert searching for food. All the members wear little umbrellas on their heads. While searching for water, Luffy accidentally broke the Barbar Pirates' ship and decide to go to Melias to search for wood in order to repair their ship.

name: Barokku Wākusu
description: Baroque Works was a criminal syndicate created by the Warlord Crocodile to destabilize and conquer the Arabasta Kingdom (and, by extension, acquire the ancient superweapon Pluton). For this sole purpose, it conducted countless acts of espionage, sabotage, and murder over a span of years, ultimately manipulating Arabasta into civil war.

name: Bareruzu Kaizokudan
description: The Barrels Pirates were a pirate crew led by Diez Barrels.

name: Baruto Kurabu
description: The Barto Club is a pirate crew led by Bartolomeo and the second ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. Following their actions on Gartel Island and confrontation with the Red Hair Pirates, their status is unknown.

name: Baian Kaizoku-dan
description: The Bayan Pirates is a pirate crew. Their captain is Bayan and their "division" commander is Zap. They have many members and their general theme is musical. They use Bayan's compositions to hypnotize enemies into obedience, and planned to use this to manipulate Amanda to reveal a treasure to them. The entire crew was eventually defeated by the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Muhige Kaizoku-dan
description: The Beardless Pirates are a non-canon pirate crew that appear in Carrot's Fluffy Picture Book yonkoma.

name: Hyakujū Kaizokudan
description: The Beasts Pirates are an extremely infamous and powerful pirate crew led by their governor-general, Kaidou, formerly one of the Four Emperors. They were based in Wano Country, specifically headquartered on Onigashima.

name: Utsukushiki Kaizoku-dan
description: The Beautiful Pirates are the first ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet, a crew commanded by Cavendish.

ship.name: Sleeping White Horse of the Forest

name: Beramī Kaizokudan
description: The Bellamy Pirates were the former pirate crew of Bellamy the Hyena. Founded in the North Blue, they held some notoriety through the first reaches of the Grand Line as an affiliate of the Donquixote Pirates, but eventually collapsed after losing favor with Donquixote Doflamingo himself.

name: Ō Kabuto Kaizokudan
description: The Big Helmet Pirates is a pirate band led by Mikazuki.

name: Biggu Mamu Kaizokudan
description: The Big Mom Pirates are an extremely infamous and powerful pirate crew led by their captain, Charlotte Linlin, better known as "Big Mom", formerly one of the Four Emperors. They are in control of the powerful nation of Totto Land, with their captain ruling it as its queen and their base of operations being Whole Cake Island, the country's main island. The captain agreed to an alliance with the Beasts Pirates for plans to take over the world. However, the captain was defeated during the Raid on Onigashima by Eustass Kid and Trafalgar Law of the Worst Generation, and she was subsequently stripped of her position as an Emperor, leaving the crew's status unknown.

name: Kuroneko Kaizokudan
description: The Black Cat Pirates' flag is a standard jolly roger with a skull the shape of a cat's head, completed with slitted eyes, and crossbones.

name: Kurohige Kaizokudan
description: The Blackbeard Pirates are an extremely infamous and powerful pirate fleet led by their admiral, Marshall D. Teach, better known as "Blackbeard", one of the Four Emperors.

name: Burikingu Kaizokudan
description: The Bliking Pirates was a pirate crew led by Wapol.

name: Burūjamu Kaizoku-dan
description: The Bluejam Pirates was a pirate crew led by Bluejam. They came into conflict with Luffy, Ace, and Sabo 12 years ago on Dawn Island, which began with Ace and Sabo stealing money from one of the crew members.

name: Bonī Kaizokudan
description: The Bonney Pirates are an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew from South Blue that made their debut on the Sabaody Archipelago the same time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there two years ago. As such, they are part of the Worst Generation. Following being defeated by the Blackbeard Pirates and captured by Akainu in the New World, Bonney was taken to Marine Headquarters, during which she was able to escape unlike her crew.

name: Bauntīzu Kaizoku-dan
description: The Bounties Pirates are a non-canon pirate crew who tried to murder all the kings attending Levely using poison gas bombs. They are affiliated with the Beasts Pirates.

name: Baunti Kaizoku-dan
description: The Bounty Pirates are a non-canon pirate crew commanded by Margin and made up of other notorious criminals he recruited.

name: Burujowa Kaizoku-dan
description: The Bourgeois Pirates are a pirate crew led by "princess" Pururu, and are a subordinate crew to the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Buriido Kaizoku-dan
description: The Breed Pirates is an anime-only pirate crew founded by Breed.

name: Chahige Kaizokudan
description: The Brownbeard Pirates were a pirate crew in the New World headed by Chadros Higelyges, better known as "Brownbeard".

name: Bagīzu Deribarī
description: Buggy's Delivery, also known as the Pirate Dispatch Organization (海賊派遣組織, Kaizoku Haken Soshiki, VIZ: "Pirate Temp Agency"), is a pirate mercenary group founded by Buggy the Star Clown. The organization has since been integrated into the Cross Guild.

name: Bagī Kaizokudan
description: The Buggy Pirates are a band of pirates led by Buggy, a former Roger Pirates apprentice.

name: Bagī ando Arubida Rengō
description: The Buggy and Alvida Alliance is an alliance formed by the pirate bands known as the Buggy Pirates and the Alvida Pirates (although only its captain remained from them) and led by the captains Buggy and Alvida.

name: Buruzuaihittsu Kaizokudan
description: The Bull's Eye Hit Pirates are a crew commanded by Sogekiller. They appear in One Piece Odyssey.

name: Kyameru Kaizoku-dan
description: The Camel Pirates are a mentioned-only pirate crew from Legend of the Rainbow Island.

name: Kyandi Kaizokudan
description: The Candy Pirates are a crew of pirates who debuted in the cover story CP9's Independent Report.

name: Karibū Kaizokudan
description: The Caribou Pirates are a crew who arrived at Sabaody Archipelago around the same time as the Straw Hats were reuniting. Their captains are the brothers Caribou and Coribou, which temporarily changed to Demaro Black when they joined the Fake Straw Hat Crew, under the belief they were real until the truth was disclosed.

name: Kentaurosu Patorōru Butai
description: The Centaur Patrol Unit was a unit of centaurs (humans who had their crippled legs replaced with functional animal ones by Trafalgar Law's powers) led by an alligator centaur named Brownbeard. They were under the ultimate control of Caesar Clown, who had them patrol Punk Hazard for trespassers. Brownbeard rebelled against Caesar for deceiving him while many others were left outside to die by the H2S experiment.

name: Kukku Kaizokudan
description: The Cook Pirates was Red-Leg Zeff's old pirate crew.

name: Kurosu Girudo
description: The Cross Guild is a New World crime syndicate headlined by three former Warlords of the Sea: Buggy, Crocodile, and Dracule Mihawk, with the goal of fulfilling Crocodile's previously failed "Operation Utopia" campaign.

name: Dansu Kaizoku-dan
description: The Dance Pirates are a crew commanded by Creese.

name: Dondoko Kaizoku-dan
description: The Dondoko Pirates are a non-canon pirate crew that appear in One Piece Premier Show 2022.

name: Donkihōte Kaizoku-dan
description: The Donquixote Pirates, also known as the Donquixote Family (ドンキホーテファミリー, Donkihōte Famirī), was a powerful pirate crew led by the former Warlord, Donquixote Doflamingo. They used to rule the kingdom of Dressrosa as the governing body, with their captain as the king. Due to their actions and role, they are the main antagonists of the Dressrosa Arc and the Dressrosa Saga as a whole.

name: Dokutā Gero Kūzoku-dan
description: The Dr. Gero Sky Pirates are a band of sky pirates from the Dragon Ball-One Piece crossover one-shot Cross Epoch.

name: Dorēku Kaizokudan
description: The Drake Pirates are an infamous and notable pirate crew originating from the North Blue, and are led by X Drake, who is later revealed to still be part of the Marines as a member of SWORD. They were introduced on Sabaody Archipelago around the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there two years ago and are part of the Worst Generation.

name: Doreiku kaizoku-dan
description: The Drayke Pirates are a crew commanded by Drayke and are the main antagonists of Legend of the Rainbow Island.

name: Erudorago Kaizoku-danErudorago Ichimi
description: The Eldoraggo Pirates are a pirate crew under the command of Eldoraggo. They act as the main antagonist group in One Piece: The Movie.

name: Funbari Karē Kaizoku-dan
description: The Endurance Curry Pirates are a crew of pirates originally created as a response to a reader contest featured in Weekly Shonen Jump in the year 2000. Designed by Eiichiro Oda together with Nobuhiro Watsuki, the author of Rurouni Kenshin, and Hiroyuki Takei, the author of Shaman King, the crew would eventually be canonized into One Piece 24 years later in Chapter 1122.

name: Ireizā Kaizokudan
description: The Eraser Pirates were a crew of pirates. They were attacked by Wyper when they entered Skypiea.

name: Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi
description: The Fake Straw Hat Crew was a group of pirates that attempted to impersonate the real Straw Hat Pirates in order to benefit from their reputation. They first appeared after the two-year time-skip and disbanded when the truth about the impostors was revealed. The recruits were arrested by the Marines except for Albion and the Caribou Pirates, who escaped, while the members of the Fake Straw Hat Crew were either captured or buried alive by the Caribou Pirates.

name: Hakaisō Kaizokudan
description: The Fallen Monk Pirates are an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew who were first seen on Sabaody Archipelago around the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there two years ago. As such, they are part of the Worst Generation, with their captain being Urouge.

name: Kiba Gaeru Kaizokudan
description: The Fanged Toad Pirates were a crew from Paradise.

name: Fesutibaru Kaizokudan
description: The Festival Pirates are a non-canon pirate crew captained by Buena Festa.

name: Faia Tanku Kaizokudan
description: The Fire Tank Pirates are an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew who are led by Capone Bege, originated in the West Blue, and arrived on the Sabaody Archipelago around the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there two years ago, along with other rookie crews. As such, they are part of the Worst Generation.

name: Fisshāzu Kaizokudan
description: The Fischer's Pirates are a pirate crew consisting of the members of Fischer's after being transported into the One Piece world.

name: Furaingu Kaizokudan
description: The Flying Pirates were a pirate crew led by Vander Decken IX, floating over the ocean floor and endangering the citizens of Fish-Man Island. The crew is possibly named after the flagship used by Vander Deckens for nine generations, the Flying Dutchman. The captains of the Flying Pirates and the New Fish-Man Pirates had sworn an alliance with each other before the captains betrayed one another. Upon Decken's arrest and imprisonment, the crew's status is currently unknown. They are the secondary antagonist group in the Fish-Man Island Arc.

name: Yonkō
description: The Four Emperors, which constitute one of the Three Great Powers, are a group of four pirates considered to be the most notorious and powerful captains in the world. They are not declared allies nor are they strictly enemies, Instead, the four prefer to remain autonomous. Currently, the Four Emperors are Red-Haired Shanks, Blackbeard, Straw Hat Luffy, and Buggy the Star Clown. Whitebeard, Big Mom, and Kaidou of the Beasts were the former known members from the previous generation prior to their succession.

name: Fokushī Kaizokudan
description: The Foxy Pirates are a group of pirates led by Foxy the Silver Fox. A majority of the crew was composed mostly of crewmen won through the Davy Back Fight. The crew was composed of 500 members, according to the anime.

name: Gyarī Kaizokudan
description: The Gally Pirates are a pirate crew that appeared in Romance Dawn, Version 1. Their captain is Crescent-Moon Gally.

name: Gyanzakku Kaizokudan
description: The Ganzack Pirates were a group of pirates led by Ganzack. They appeared in the first OVA.

name: Gasupāde Kaizokudan
description: The Gasparde Pirates were a pirate crew that appeared in the fourth movie. They were headed by former Marine officer, "General" Gasparde, and his right-hand man, Needless.

name: Gekkō Kaizokudan
description: The Gecko Pirates were the former pirate crew of Gecko Moria.

name: Gējitsu kaizoku-dan
description: The Gejitsu Pirates are a crew commanded by Yuta.

name: Baikin Kaizokudan
description: The Germ Pirates are a crew led by Sukare Tainen that debuted in the cover story "Gang" Bege's Oh My Family.

name: Kyo Hei Kaizoku-dan
description: The Giant Warrior Pirates is a pirate crew made up of giants from Elbaph lead by Dorry and Brogy. Before them, the crew's captains were Jarul and Jorul. They disbanded 102 years ago when Dorry and Brogy began their duel, but reunited once they returned to Elbaph. They are major allies of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Egghead Arc.

name: Kinjishi Kaizokudan
description: The Golden Lion Pirates, previously known as the Flying Pirates (空飛ぶ海賊団, Soratobu Kaizokudan), are a pirate crew led by Shiki the Golden Lion. They are the main antagonist group of One Piece: Strong World.

name: Gorugon San Shimai
description: The Gorgon Sisters are the three sisters of the Boa family. They rule over the entire Kuja tribe and the Kuja Pirates. They acted as the primary antagonists of the Amazon Lily Arc.

name: Jairo Kaizokudan
description: The Gyro Pirates is a pirate crew from South Blue, under captain Gyro.

name: Happō Suigun
description: The Happo Navy is a pirate crew led by the Chinjao Family of the Kano Country. Under Sai, the Happo Navy is the third ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

name: Hōkinsu Kaizokudan
description: The Hawkins Pirates are an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew introduced in Sabaody Archipelago around the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there two years ago. As such, they are part of the Worst Generation, with their captain being Basil Hawkins.

name: Hāto no Kaizokudan
description: The Heart Pirates are an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew from the North Blue and introduced on Sabaody Archipelago around the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there two years ago. Their captain, Trafalgar D. Water Law, is a member of the Worst Generation and a former member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. They were in an alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates, Kouzuki Family, and Mink Tribe with the goal of taking down both Donquixote Doflamingo of the Seven Warlords of the Sea and Kaidou of the Four Emperors. The alliance was dissolved after their objective of taking down Doflamingo and Kaidou was achieved.

name: Hokahoka Kaizokudan
description: The Hokahoka Pirates  are a pirate crew whom Okome belongs to as a first mate.

name: Harapeko Kaizokudan
description: The Hunger Pirates are a pirate crew seen on Jail Island. They first appeared in One Piece: World Seeker.

name: Danī, Denī, Donī
description: Denny has black fuzzy hair that has a disco style to it, a goatee of the same color, and a square face with a somewhat big nose. He wore pink disco clothes that has white edges, a purple pirate sash, and white shoes.

name: Ideo Kaizokudan
description: The Ideo Pirates, formerly known as the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance (XXX（トリプルエックス）ジム格闘連合, Toripuru-Ekkusu Jimu Kakutō Rengō, pronounced "Triple X Gym Martial Arts Alliance") is a pirate crew led by Ideo and the fourth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

name: Hyakumushi Kaizoku-dan
description: The Insect Pirates are a crew commanded by Insk, who is also the only member. They appear in One Piece Odyssey.

name: Isshī Wanhandoreddo
description: The Isshi-100 are the medical corps of Drum Island's Sakura Kingdom, comprising one hundred professional doctors led by Kureha.

name: Kurage Kaizokudan
description: The Jellyfish Pirates are a pirate crew that appear in One Piece Film: Red.

name: Kariku Kaizoku-dan
description: The Kalik Pirates are a non-canon pirate crew operating in the North Blue.

name: Kiddo Kaizokudan
description: The Kid Pirates were an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew introduced during the Sabaody Archipelago Arc during the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there two years ago. As such, they are part of the Worst Generation. Like the Straw Hats, this crew had two bounties above 100,000,000. Both members had slightly higher bounties than the respective members of the Straw Hat Pirates before the timeskip. Their captain is Eustass Kid.

name: Kurīku Kaizokudan
description: The Krieg Pirates, also known as the Pirate Armada (海賊艦隊, Kaizoku Kantai), are an East Blue pirate fleet led by Don Krieg. At their height, they boasted some five thousand men across fifty ships, and held the most notorious reputation in the East Blue, until they were decimated by Dracule Mihawk. Sometime after the events of the Baratie Arc, Krieg, Gin and Pearl managed to make it to the New World where they now reside on Hachinosu.

name: Kuja Kaizokudan
description: The Kuja Pirates (literally meaning "Nine Snakes Pirates") is a crew of female pirates from Amazon Lily. All of the crew members are women chosen from the Kuja tribe of their homeland. Their captain is the Empress of the Kuja tribe, as well as the former member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, Boa Hancock. Second in command are Hancock's younger sisters, Boa Sandersonia and Boa Marigold.

name: Ritoru Kaizokudan
description: The Little Pirates is a pirate crew led by Little Oars Jr. It is a subordinate crew of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Rongu Rongu Kaizokudan
description: The Long Long Pirates' Jolly Roger resembles a normal skull and crossbones, with the exception of the top of the skull being elongated, much like Long Long's hair.

name: Makuro Ichimi
description: The Macro Pirates are a trio of fish-men who are notable for attempting to abduct the mermaid Camie thirty-one times.

name: Kyōken Kaizoku-dan
description: The Mad Dog Pirates are a pirate crew in Paradise. They appear in Legend of the Rainbow Island.

name: Ō Uzu Gumo Kaizokudan
description: The Maelstrom Spider Pirates is a pirate crew, led by Squard. It is a subordinate crew of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Makiguso Kaizoku-dan
description: The Makiguso Pirates are a pirate crew commanded by Chinpy and the protagonists of Chin Piece.

name: Mashira Kaizokudan
description: The Masira Pirates is a crew of treasure hunters and shipwreck salvagers. Their captain is Masira. They are part of the Saruyama Alliance, alongside the Shoujou Pirates and Mont Blanc Cricket.

name: Massuru Kaizoku-dan
description: The Mussel Pirates are a pirate crew seen on Jail Island. They first appeared in the video game One Piece: World Seeker.

name: Chobihige Kaizokudan
description: The Mustache Pirates was a pirate crew in the sixth One Piece movie. It was headed by Brief.

name: Nāgerusu Kaizoku-dan
description: The Nagels Pirates are a non-canon pirate crew operating in the North Blue.

name: Naguri Kaizoku-dan
description: The Naguri Pirates were a group of pirates from Gol D. Roger's time.

name: Naniwa kaizoku-dan
description: Donai, Nanya, and Honma are the only known members.

name: Nyū Donkihōte Famirī
description: The New Donquixote Family is a pirate crew formed by Kardia to avenge Donquixote Doflamingo. They are the primary antagonists of One Piece Premier Show 2021.

name: Shin Gyojin Kaizoku-dan
description: The New Fish-Man Pirates were a pirate crew led by Hody Jones. The crew was comprised almost entirely of fish-men residing on Fish-Man Island, though they also included several merfolk, sea beasts, and enslaved humans. The New Fish-Man Pirates were the most prominent figures in the long history of human/fish-men hate over their hero Fisher Tiger's death. They carried on the legacy of Arlong, having established their crew based on Arlong's ideals. Like Arlong, they wished to make fish-men the supreme race and aimed to sink the humans into the ocean.

name: Shin Kyo Hei Kaizoku-dan
description: The New Giant Warrior Pirates are a pirate crew of giants led by Hajrudin. The crew is a spiritual revival of the Giant Warrior Pirates that disbanded 100 years ago. They were once part of Buggy's Delivery, before leaving to become the sixth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet after the events on Dressrosa.

name: Naito Batafurai Kaizoku-dan
description: The Night Butterfly Pirates are a pirate crew subordinate to the Red Hair Pirates led by Linaria.

name: Ninja Kaizoku Minku Samurai Dōmei
description: The Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance, originally Straw Hat-Heart Alliance, was an alliance first formed between the Straw Hat Pirates and Heart Pirates, but later on expanded to the Kouzuki Family and the Mink Tribe. Their goal was to take down Kaidou of the Four Emperors, which succeeded during an all-out battle and put an end to Kaidou's master plan.

name: Nokkusu Kaizokudan
description: The Nox Pirates, initially known as the Nox Expedition Party (ノックス探検隊, Nokkusu Tanken-tai), was a pirate crew of minks led by Pedro. They initially set sail from Zou as explorers with the intention of finding poneglyphs, but were chased by the World Government and ended up receiving bounties. The crew was defeated in Totto Land five years ago, causing it to be disbanded.

name: Nanbāzu
description: The Numbers are a group within the Beasts Pirates made up of artificially produced ancient giants. Originally created on Punk Hazard, they were deemed to be unsuccessful and were eventually bought by Kaidou. They later resided on Onigashima and served as combatants for the crew.

name: On Ea Kaizokudan
description: The On Air Pirates are an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew discovered on the Sabaody Archipelago around the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived two years ago. As such, they are part of the Worst Generation, with their captain being Scratchmen Apoo. During the timeskip, they became a subordinate crew to the Beasts Pirates.

name: Operā Kaizoku-dan
description: The Opera Pirates are a crew commanded by Lazarus.

name: Otearai Kaizoku-dan
description: The Otearai Pirates are a crew commanded by Sekken De Tearai. They capture other pirates, collecting their bounties.

name: Momohige Kaizokudan
description: The Peachbeard Pirates is a pirate crew under captain Peachbeard that affiliated themselves with the Blackbeard Pirates.

name: Fenikkusu Kaizokudan
description: The Phoenix Pirates is a pirate crew, who appeared in the filler Ice Hunter Arc.

name: Pirabaggī Akutō Dōmei
description: The Pilabuggy Villain Alliance is an alliance between Pilaf and Buggy, formed to take down Goku and Luffy. They act as comedic antagonists in the crossover one-shot Cross Epoch.

name: Kaizoku Dōmei
description: The captains who formed the alliance are theoretically equal in status, and cannot give each other orders. They may have limited control over each other's crews, but the highest authority still lies with the respective captains. In a situation where one of the captains gets captured, the other can take charge of their remaining subordinates.

name: Pureshūzu
description: The Précieuses are a trio of fish-women who serve under Gad. They were formerly members of the Simon Pirates.

name: Datsugoku Chīmu
description: The Prison Escape Team was a temporary alliance formed with the goal of escaping Impel Down and travelling to Marineford to join the Summit War.

name: Mizutamari Kaizoku-dan
description: The Puddle Pirates are a pirate crew led by Gerotini, and are a subordinate crew to the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Reddo Arōzu Kaizokudan
description: The Red Arrows Pirates are a band of pirates exclusive to the sixth One Piece movie. They were active during the era of Gol D. Roger.

name: Akagami Kaizoku-dan
description: The Red Hair Pirates are an extremely infamous and powerful pirate crew ruling in the New World, captained by their chief, Red-Haired Shanks, one of the Four Emperors and a former apprentice of the Roger Pirates.

name: Rokkusu Kaizokudan
description: The Rocks Pirates were a legendary and powerful pirate crew that sailed the seas until their defeat at God Valley 38 years ago.

name: Rojā Kaizoku-dan
description: The Roger Pirates were the pirate crew of the late Pirate King, Gol D. Roger. They were, and remain, the only known crew to traverse the entirety of the Grand Line and reach its final island Laugh Tale.

name: Rōringu Kaizokudan
description: The Rolling Pirates are a group of pirates introduced in the Thriller Bark Arc. They are led by the 23rd daughter of the Charlotte Family, Charlotte Lola. The crew had their own shadows taken away by Gecko Moria, and they aid Luffy in helping him defeat Moria by stuffing as many shadows as they can into him, making him more powerful.

name: Roshio Kaizoku-dan
description: The Roshio Pirates is a group of pirates led by Roshio.

name: Runbā Kaizokudan
description: The Rumbar Pirates are a long dead pirate crew from the West Blue. They were first mentioned by Crocus as the group of pirates who brought Laboon to the Twin Capes.

name: Saruyama Rengō-gun
description: The Saruyama Alliance (lit. "Monkey Mountain Alliance") is a Pirate Alliance formed between three pirate captains: Mont Blanc Cricket and his surrogate sons, the brothers "Salvage King" Masira and "Sonar King" Shoujou. As an alliance, it joins the brothers' respective crews, the Masira Pirates and the Shoujou Pirates.

name: Sasaki Kaizokudan
description: The Sasaki Pirates were a pirate crew originating from the Grand Line that was once captained by Sasaki before he joined the Beasts Pirates.

name: Shunaidā Kaizokudan
description: The Schneider Pirates are a pirate crew active in Paradise.

name: Kaijū Kaizokudan
description: The Sea Animal Pirates is an anime-only pirate crew founded by a Kung-Fu Dugong from the Arabasta Kingdom.

name: Ōka Shichibukai
description: The Seven Warlords of the Sea, or simply the Seven Warlords, were a selection of seven incredibly powerful and notorious pirates authorized by the World Government. Collectively, they comprised one of the Three Great Powers keeping the world in balance.

name: Shōjō Kaizokudan
description: The Shoujou Pirates is a crew of treasure hunters and echolocating explorers. Their captain is Shoujou. They are part of the Saruyama Alliance, alongside the Masira Pirates and Mont Blanc Cricket.

name: Shirubā Kaizoku Rengō
description: The Silver Pirate Alliance is a non-canon alliance of various pirate crews based on the island of Silver Mine. They are antagonists in the Silver Mine Arc. Contrary to a typical Pirate Alliance, this group has one overall leader, Bill. However, their captain Bill only intended to use them to bring him treasure and also kill them to gain their bounties. After the defeat of Bill and the top members, the alliance dissolved.

name: Saimon Kaizoku-dan
description: The Simon Pirates (サイモン海賊団, Saimon Kaizoku-dan) were a pirate crew led by Simon in the game, One Piece: Great Hidden Treasure of the Nanatsu Islands.

name: Soshiaru Kurabu
description: The Social Club are a pirate crew led by their bandmaster, Fugar. They are a subordinate crew to the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Uchū Kaizoku
description: The Space Pirates are a pirate crew of aliens originating from outer space. They are moon miners that mine anything they can find.

name: Supēdo Kaizokudan
description: The Spade Pirates was the former pirate crew of Portgas D. Ace that was founded five years before the current storyline. The crew later disbanded when its members integrated into the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Gekikara Supaisu Kaizoku-dan
description: The Spicy Spice Pirates are a crew commanded by Terrance. They are obsessed with spices, and regularly assault merchant ships to steal them.

name: Mugiwara Dai-sendan
description: The Straw Hat Grand Fleet is a fleet formed by seven pirate crews who vowed to serve under the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Mugiwara no Ichimi
description: The Straw Hat Pirates, also known as the Mugiwara Pirates, Straw Hat Crew or  simply the Straw Hats, are an extremely infamous and powerful pirate crew that originated from the East Blue. They are the main focus and protagonists of the manga and anime One Piece and are led by the main protagonist, Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Taiyō no Kaizokudan
description: The Sun Pirates, sometimes known as the Fish-Man Pirates (魚人海賊団, Gyojin Kaizoku-dan), are a pirate crew formed by the late Fisher Tiger. The crew is notable for having Jinbe and Arlong as part of its members, the former eventually becoming the second captain of the crew, and later, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. This crew split apart into three factions eleven years ago: the Sun Pirates under Jinbe, the Arlong Pirates under Arlong, and the Macro Pirates under Macro. The Sun Pirates were pardoned by the World Government when Jinbe became a Warlord of the Sea, but lost the pardon when he abdicated his title. They later went to serve under Emperor Big Mom until Jinbe rebelled and joined the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Suītsu Kaizokudan
description: The Sweet Pirates are an all-female group of pirates led by Desire, originating from the East Blue. The crew was nearly annihilated by the Silver Pirate Alliance, and the remaining members joined the Alliance, not knowing that they were the attackers, officially dissolving the crew. Later, the remaining four members were betrayed by the Silver Pirate Alliance and set back out to sea on their own.

name: Takotopasu Kaizokudan
description: The Takotopus Pirates are a pirate crew led by Karma. They were a subordinate crew of the Whitebeard Pirates prior to Whitebeard's death.

name: Ochanoma Kaizokudan
description: The Tearoom Pirates are a family of pirates who appear in the sixth movie.

name: Surirā Bāku Kaizokudan
description: The Thriller Bark Pirates is the second pirate crew captained by the former Warlord, Gecko Moria. They are the main antagonist group in the Thriller Bark Arc, where they operated from the mysterious Florian Triangle to abduct unsuspecting victims of their shadows for their undead zombie army.

name: Han Dai Kaizoku-dan
description: The Title Card Pirates are a mentioned-only pirate crew from Legend of the Rainbow Island.

name: Osuneko Kaizoku-dan
description: The Tomcat Pirates are a mentioned-only pirate crew from Legend of the Rainbow Island.

name: Tongari Kaizoku-dan
description: The Tongari Pirates are a non-canon pirate crew who tried to recruit new members from Tongari Island's visitors.

name: Tontatta Kaizokudan
description: The Tontatta Pirates, formerly known as Tonta Corps (トンタ兵団, Tonta Heidan), are the armed forces of the Tontatta Tribe formed in order to commence Operation SOP, and later, reformed as a pirate crew. They are composed of 200 dwarves under the command of Leo, forming the fifth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

name: Totto Rando Dai-kantai
description: The Totto Land Grand Fleet is a massive fleet of ships owned and operated by the Big Mom Pirates.

name: Torejā Kaizokudan
description: The Treasure Pirates are a treasure hunting pirate crew led by Mad Treasure.

name: Toranpu Kyōdai
description: The Trump Pirates are an East Blue pirate crew under the command of the Trump Siblings, a group of animal/playing-card themed captains led by Bear King. They are the main antagonists of the second movie.

name: Chūrippu Kaizokudan
description: The Tulip Pirates are a group of pirates that appeared in Jango's cover story.

name: Wetton Kaizoku-dan
description: The Wetton Pirates was an anime-only pirate crew. They first appeared in the Ruluka Island Arc.

name: Shirohige Kaizokudan
description: The Whitebeard Pirates were once one of the strongest pirate crews in the world, as their late captain, Edward Newgate, better known as "Whitebeard", was one of the Four Emperors and the only man to have ever been a match for the Pirate King, Gol D. Roger, in a fight. Whitebeard's crew was segmented into divisions, with each led by a powerful division commander. The crew also had multiple subordinate crews operating in the New World, allowing the pirate crew to function as a massive pirate fleet. In addition, they controlled several territories throughout the New World, including Fish-Man Island.

name: Fūzu Fū Kaizokudan
description: The Who's-Who Pirates were a pirate crew that was once captained by Who's-Who before he joined the Beasts Pirates. Currently the only known member is the captain Who's-Who.

name: Wārudo Kaizokudan
description: The World Pirates is an anime-only pirate crew founded by Byrnndi World that was infamous 30 years ago.

name: Saiaku no Sedai
description: The Worst Generation is a term referring to twelve infamous pirates who emerged immediately before the beginning of the Summit War of Marineford. They consist of the eleven super rookies present at the Sabaody Archipelago just before said war, and the then-Warlord Blackbeard, who gained the title following his victory over Ace during the Duel on Banaro Island. They are notorious for the bold actions they committed against the World Government and have bounties of over 100,000,000.

name: Iesu Kaizokudan
description: The Yes Pirates were a pirate crew that originated from the East Blue.

name: Yonta Maria Dai-sendan
description: The Yonta Maria Grand Fleet is a group of 56 ships led by Orlumbus. It shares its name with its flagship, the Yonta Maria. After the defeat of Doflamingo, the flagship became the seventh ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet and with it the entire Yonta Maria Grand Fleet.

name: Zenī Kaizoku-dan
description: The Zenny Pirates are a pirate crew that the Straw Hat Pirates helped to head to the sea.
